channel.title: Help ! HELP !?!
channel.description:
Ive been here for all day , plz me
HEllo , first i hope u can help me, when someone added a topic at the TUT or watherver section sometimes after a topic will come an image with new in,and the topic is back in ad the first paper. How u put that image for it that ur topic is new, because my topic is at page 23-24 i think and i just want to put it back at the first page without deleting it or put it twice online how do i need to do that?
Sry for my bad english
ty for the guys who want to help me!
